cards.name: 敲门砖
cards.meaning: 比喻借以谋取名利或达到某种目的的工具或手段。一旦目的达到，工具便被抛弃。
cards.story: 明代科举制度盛行，读书人为了敲开仕途之门，必须熟读八股文。八股文就像一块砖头，用来敲开官府的大门。一旦考中进士，这块“敲门砖”便完成了使命，被弃之不顾。后来人们用此比喻借以谋取名利的工具。
cards.prompt: A trading card design with a heavy historical feel, ancient Chinese art style, realistic texture, depicting a scholar in Ming Dynasty attire holding a brick-like object, standing before a heavy wooden gate of a government office, dim lantern light, intricate ink wash painting details, muted earth tones with accents of deep red, historical authenticity.
